constitutionalValues.name: Integrity
constitutionalValues.description: All actions must be honest, transparent, and trustworthy

constitutionalValues.name: Dignity
constitutionalValues.description: Every person deserves respect and inherent worth

constitutionalValues.name: Justice
constitutionalValues.description: Fair treatment for all, equal application of rules

constitutionalValues.name: Compassion
constitutionalValues.description: Empathy and care for all people, especially vulnerable

constitutionalValues.name: Sovereignty
constitutionalValues.description: Individual ownership and autonomy are absolute

constitutionalValues.name: Transparency
constitutionalValues.description: All system operations are auditable and visible

constitutionalValues.name: Privacy
constitutionalValues.description: Personal data is owned by the individual, never sold

constitutionalValues.name: Liberty
constitutionalValues.description: Freedom from oppression, coercion, and undue control

constitutionalValues.name: Equality
constitutionalValues.description: Equal access and opportunity for all participants

constitutionalValues.name: Security
constitutionalValues.description: Protection from harm, threats, and exploitation

constitutionalValues.name: Abundance
constitutionalValues.description: Systems designed to generate and share wealth fairly

constitutionalValues.name: Sustainability
constitutionalValues.description: Long-term viability over short-term gain

constitutionalValues.name: Education
constitutionalValues.description: Access to knowledge is a fundamental right

constitutionalValues.name: Health
constitutionalValues.description: Physical and mental wellbeing for all participants

constitutionalValues.name: Community
constitutionalValues.description: Collective wellbeing over individual exploitation

constitutionalValues.name: Innovation
constitutionalValues.description: Progress and improvement are encouraged and rewarded

constitutionalValues.name: Accountability
constitutionalValues.description: All actors are responsible for their actions

constitutionalValues.name: Consent
constitutionalValues.description: Informed consent required for all significant actions

constitutionalValues.name: Stewardship
constitutionalValues.description: Responsible management of shared resources

constitutionalValues.name: Reciprocity
constitutionalValues.description: Fair exchange and mutual benefit in all dealings

constitutionalValues.name: Resilience
constitutionalValues.description: System must withstand attacks, failures, and disruptions

constitutionalValues.name: Inclusion
constitutionalValues.description: All people regardless of background are welcome

constitutionalValues.name: Truth
constitutionalValues.description: Accurate information is fundamental to all decisions

constitutionalValues.name: Protection
constitutionalValues.description: Vulnerable populations receive extra safeguards

constitutionalValues.name: Evolution
constitutionalValues.description: Continuous improvement and adaptation is required

dysfunctionalRules.description: No deceptive practices, fake metrics, or misleading data
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE action LIKE '%false%' OR action LIKE '%fake%'

dysfunctionalRules.description: No exploitation of workers, users, or vulnerable people
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM wage_records WHERE actual_rate < minimum_wage

dysfunctionalRules.description: No forced agreements, coerced consent, or undue pressure
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE consent_timestamp IS NULL

dysfunctionalRules.description: No discrimination based on race, gender, age, religion, or any protected class
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM decisions WHERE bias_score > 0.3

dysfunctionalRules.description: No unauthorized surveillance or tracking
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM access_log WHERE consent = false AND data_type = 'personal'

dysfunctionalRules.description: No monopolistic control of essential resources or information
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT owner, COUNT(*) as resources FROM resources GROUP BY owner HAVING resources > 1000

dysfunctionalRules.description: No suppression of legitimate speech or information
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM content_moderation WHERE reason NOT IN ('illegal','harmful','spam')

dysfunctionalRules.description: No wage theft, unpaid overtime, or benefits denial
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM time_records t LEFT JOIN payments p ON t.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE p.amount < t.hours_worked * t.rate

dysfunctionalRules.description: No selling of personal data without explicit consent
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM data_transfers WHERE purpose = 'sale' AND consent_id IS NULL

dysfunctionalRules.description: No assistance in creating weapons or causing harm
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM requests WHERE category = 'weapons' OR category = 'violence'

dysfunctionalRules.description: Absolute protection of children from any exploitation
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM content WHERE age_restricted = true AND viewer_age < 18

dysfunctionalRules.description: No fraudulent transactions, false claims, or scams
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE fraud_score > 0.8

dysfunctionalRules.description: No unauthorized access to private communications or data
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM access_log WHERE resource_owner != accessor AND permission IS NULL

dysfunctionalRules.description: No violation of attorney-client, medical, or other privilege
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM communications WHERE privilege_type IS NOT NULL AND accessed_by != authorized_party

dysfunctionalRules.description: No manipulation of voting or electoral processes
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM votes WHERE anomaly_score > 0.5

dysfunctionalRules.description: No actions that cause environmental damage beyond acceptable limits
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM operations WHERE carbon_impact > threshold

dysfunctionalRules.description: No spreading of known false information
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM content WHERE fact_check_score < 0.3

dysfunctionalRules.description: No pyramid schemes, Ponzi schemes, or unsustainable financial structures
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM revenue_models WHERE sustainability_score < 0.5

dysfunctionalRules.description: No unauthorized access to systems, networks, or accounts
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM login_attempts WHERE success = false AND count > 5

dysfunctionalRules.description: No theft of intellectual property or creative works
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM content WHERE attribution IS NULL AND source IS NOT NULL

dysfunctionalRules.description: No exploiting addictive behaviors or psychological vulnerabilities
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM engagement WHERE dark_pattern_score > 0.7

dysfunctionalRules.description: No actions that deny people basic needs (food, shelter, water)
dysfunctionalRules.query: SELECT * FROM ubi_recipients WHERE last_payment > 30
